category.name: LDAP
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: LDAP_role_attr_mapping
preference.preference_description:
Maps LDAP attributes to Teamcenter role attributes. The mappings control what information the synchronization tool sets in the Teamcenter role object.LDAP_role_attr_mapping= LDAPRoleName cn %REPLACE_ME% LDAPRoleDesc description %REPLACE_ME% LDAPLastUpdate modifyTimestamp %REPLACE_ME%
Valid values: Accepts triples of strings.Each attribute mapping consists of three strings: the Teamcenter attribute name, the mapped LDAP attribute name, and the default value (to be used if there is no LDAP mapped attribute or if the LDAP mapped attribute value is null).
